import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Field, reduxForm } from 'redux-form' const formtodisplay=['FirmDetails','PromoterDetails','ProjectDetails'] const SimpleForm = props => { const [formType, setFormType] = useState(1); const prevStep=()=>{ setFormType(formType-1) } const nextStep = () => { setFormType(formType+1) } const { handleSubmit, pristine, reset, submitting } = props const renderForm=()=>{ switch(formType) { case "FirmDetails": return(

Please Fill all the forms displayed in options above!

) case "PromoterDetails": return(

Please Fill all the forms displayed in options above!

) case "Project Details": return(

Please Fill all the forms displayed in options above!

) default : return(

Please Fill all the forms displayed in options above!

) } } return (
{renderForm()}
) } export default reduxForm({ form: 'simple' // a unique identifier for this form })(SimpleForm)
